subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Bearcats got off to a torrid start Friday by jumping out to a 25-8 lead against the Orange, who have never won the Big East championship in six appearances as the No. 1 seed.
snippet: The Bearcats got off to a torrid start Friday by jumping out to a 25-8 lead against the Orange, who have never won the Big East championship in six appearances as the No. 1 seed.
